data.meta_description: The invention discloses a ziziphus jujube mill rhizosphere bacillus sp. capable of promoting growth, which is named Bacillus sp. by classification, and is preserved in China General Microbiological Culture Collection Center (CGMCC) on 11th, Oct, 2011, the preserved number is CGMCC No.5318. The invention also discloses an application of the ziziphus jujube mill rhizosphere bacillus sp. in growth promotion of ziziphus jujube mill. The bacterial strain is prepared to an inoculant for inoculating the sprouts of ziziphus jujube mill, the result shows that the inoculant is capable of obviously promoting the growth of seedling root of ziziphus jujube mill, raising the proportion of fine roots in root, and increasing the growth of ground diameter and height of the ziziphus jujube mill sprouts. Control groups have obvious differences. The ziziphus jujube mill rhizosphere bacillus sp. capable of promoting growth is inoculated in fermented chicken manure to prepare a biological fertilizer, and is used around the root of seven-year ziziphus jujube mill, thereby, the root vitality is substantially raised, the content of the root secretion in the ziziphus jujube mill rhizosphere soil is increased, and the absorption and utilization capability of the soil nutrient of the ziziphus jujube mill rhizosphere is enhanced.

Abstract

The invention discloses a ziziphus jujube mill rhizosphere bacillus sp. capable of promoting growth, which is named Bacillus sp. by classification, and is preserved in China General Microbiological Culture Collection Center (CGMCC) on 11th, Oct, 2011, the preserved number is CGMCC No.5318. The invention also discloses an application of the ziziphus jujube mill rhizosphere bacillus sp. in growth promotion of ziziphus jujube mill. The bacterial strain is prepared to an inoculant for inoculating the sprouts of ziziphus jujube mill, the result shows that the inoculant is capable of obviously promoting the growth of seedling root of ziziphus jujube mill, raising the proportion of fine roots in root, and increasing the growth of ground diameter and height of the ziziphus jujube mill sprouts. Control groups have obvious differences. The ziziphus jujube mill rhizosphere bacillus sp. capable of promoting growth is inoculated in fermented chicken manure to prepare a biological fertilizer, and is used around the root of seven-year ziziphus jujube mill, thereby, the root vitality is substantially raised, the content of the root secretion in the ziziphus jujube mill rhizosphere soil is increased, and the absorption and utilization capability of the soil nutrient of the ziziphus jujube mill rhizosphere is enhanced.

Description

The one living subtilis of strain winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting and application thereof

Technical field

The present invention relates to the living subtilis of strain winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting and an application thereof.

Background technology

Winter jujube (Ziziphus jujube Mill.) is Rhamnaceae (Rhamnaceae) zizyphus (Ziziphus Mill.) plant, mainly be distributed in the Huanghe delta one band of China, originate in China, VC content is very high, can reach 400ï½600mg/100g, higher 10ï½13 times than citrus fruits, nutrition is very abundant, has high nutritive value and food therapy value.The production management process of winter jujube is very complicated, and fertilising is one of them very important link.The Fertilization Effect of winter jujube is except the impact that is subjected to soil, the nutritive property of forest own, rate of fertilizer application, and is also relevant with fertilizer variety.At present, the fertilising of winter jujube is take readily avaiable fertilizer as main, but winter jujube root system is undeveloped, poor growth, and capillary radical amount is few, poor nutrient absorption capability.Therefore, general readily avaiable fertilizer can not satisfy winter the recuperate characteristics of minute demand chronicity and persistence of jujube tree.In addition, along with the increase of global energy crisis and applying quantity of chemical fertilizer, the negative impact that readily avaiable fertilizer is used constantly manifests.A large amount of chemical fertilizer use the fruit quality that has not only affected the winter jujube, also environment has been caused potential threat.Descend such as the Sustainable Production ability of soil, the eutrophication of soil compaction, surface water resources, the groundwater resource nitrate content exceeds standard etc.Therefore, seeking a kind of new-type fertilizer, to satisfy the demand of winter jujube tree bulk-growth particularly important.Microbial fertilizer can not only be improved soil, improves the ecotope of soil fauna, can also the Effective Raise plant to the absorption of soil nutrient.Therefore, seek new biomass fertilizers, to substitute or the research of part replacing fertilizer seems particularly important.

The microorganism of plant rhizosphere is many and enliven, and has consisted of the distinctive micro-flora of rhizosphere.Plant rhizosphere urge endophytic bacteria (PGPR) be existence in the plant rhizosphere scope, direct or indirect Promoting plant growth or pathogenic bacteria is had the useful bacterium general designation of antagonistic action.The short endophytic bacteria of plant rhizosphere can be secreted the plant growth-promoting material, comprises plant hormone, VITAMIN, amino acid and other active organic molecule and derivative etc.Also can improve the nutrient environment of plant rhizosphere, effectively control Plant diseases etc.The monoid of the short endophytic bacteria of plant rhizosphere is various, wherein existing useful population, also harmful population.According to incompletely statistics, found to comprise that the short endophytic bacteria of more than 20 plant rhizospheres that belong to such as pseudomonas and bud pole bacterium has disease prevention growth-promoting potential.At present, the screening of relevant winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting endophytic bacteria bacterial strain and the research of application have no report.

Summary of the invention

For above-mentioned prior art, the invention provides the living subtilis of strain winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting and an application thereof.

The present invention is achieved by the following technical solutions:

The living subtilis of one strain winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting,, its Classification And Nomenclature is bacillus sp., is preserved in China Committee for Culture Collection of Microorganisms common micro-organisms center on October 11st, 2011, its deposit number is CGMCC No.5318.

The colony characteristics of the living subtilis of described winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting is: DZ1 is rounded opaque after the LB flat board is cultivated 24h, smooth surface.The somatic cells size is the Î¼ m of (0.7-0.8) Î¼ m * (2.0-3.0).Produce gemma, G +, the cell direct rod shape.

The physiological and biochemical property of the living subtilis of described winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting is: gelatin liquification test is positive, the Starch Hydrolysis negative, indole test is negative, and Fu Yipu tests positive, and nitrate reduction test is negative, Citrate trianion utilization test is positive, glucose produces sour negative, glucose aerogenesis negative, and catalase test is positive, Nagler's reaction is negative, and the required NaCl test of 2%, 5% and 7% growth is all positive.

The optimal culture conditions of the living pseudomonas of described winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting is: LB substratum: peptone 10g, yeast extract paste 5g, NaCl10g, distilled water 1000ml.Temperature: 37 â, pH 7.0.

The living subtilis of described winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting can be for the preparation of microbial fertilizer.During application, cultivate the living subtilis of winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting, get bacteria suspension, bacteria suspension is as liquid fertilizer, and the concentration of bacteria suspension is preferably 1 * 10 8Cfu/ml.Or: cultivate the living subtilis of winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting, get bacteria suspension, then with bacterial suspension inoculation in fertilizer, make the Winter jujube biological fertilizer, the concentration of bacteria suspension is preferably 5.0 * 10 8Cfu/ml, viable count is preferably 0.5 * 10 in the Winter jujube biological fertilizer 8Cfu/g.

Described fertilizer is Chicken dung.

The present invention also provides a kind of microbial fertilizer, obtains by following preparation method: cultivate the living subtilis of winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting, get bacteria suspension, bacteria suspension is as liquid fertilizer.Or: cultivate the living subtilis of winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting, get bacteria suspension, then with bacterial suspension inoculation in fertilizer, make the Winter jujube biological fertilizer.

Show after deliberation, the bacteria suspension bacterium of the living subtilis preparation of winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting of the present invention is inoculated in winter jujube seedling, can obviously promote the growth of winter jujube seedling root, (ï¼2mm) ratio increases the growth of winter jujube seedling leading thread and height to improve radicula in the root system.Compared with the control, significant difference.The living subtilis of winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting of the present invention is inoculated into makes bio-feritlizer in the fermentation poultry dung, be applied to around the winter jujube root system of life in 7 years, can significantly improve improving activity of root system, increase the content of root exudates in the winter jujube rhizosphere soil, strengthen winter jujube root system to the ability that absorbs of soil nutrient.Result of study shows that this microbial inoculum can promote obviously that the winter jujube grows, and improves the ecotope of winter jujube rhizosphere soil, and the present invention will be widely used for the microbial fertilizer of developing in the future winter jujube special use provides good strain resource.

Description of drawings

The living subtilis of one strain winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting, bacterial strain is DZ1, this strain classification called after bacillus sp., be preserved in China Committee for Culture Collection of Microorganisms common micro-organisms center on October 11st, 2011, its deposit number is CGMCC No.5318, and the preservation address is: No. 3 Institute of Microorganism, Academia Sinica in Yard 1, BeiChen xi Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing City.

Fig. 1 is the winter jujube root system comparison diagram of DZ1 treatment group and control group.

Embodiment

The present invention is further illustrated below in conjunction with embodiment.

The screening of the living subtilis of embodiment 1 winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting

(1) screening process:

By the gradient dilution method, from the Rhizosphere sampling of Binzhou, Shandong Province forestry bureau winter jujube Demonstration Garden, isolate 87 strain isolates.By three zoning collimation methods the bacterium that is separated to is carried out purifying, and judge whether purifying of bacterial strain by microscopy, the bacterium behind the purifying is numbered, picking list bacterium colony is transferred on the LB inclined-plane and saves backup.Filter out 23 strains and protect preferably bacterial strain of green effect by protecting green method, in conjunction with radish cotyledon weightening finish method, finishing screen is selected the bacterium that 1 strain has the good short fruit of coming into force, and is designated as DZ1.

(2) colony characteristics and thalli morphology:

DZ1 is rounded opaque after the LB flat board is cultivated 24h, smooth surface.The somatic cells size is the Î¼ m of (0.7-0.8) Î¼ m * (2.0-3.0).Produce gemma, G +, the cell direct rod shape.

(3) physiological and biochemical property:

Gelatin liquification test is positive, the Starch Hydrolysis negative, indole test is negative, and Fu Yipu tests positive, and nitrate reduction test is negative, Citrate trianion utilization test is positive, glucose produces sour negative, glucose aerogenesis negative, and catalase test is positive, Nagler's reaction is negative, and the required NaCl test of 2%, 5% and 7% growth is all positive.

(4) 16S rDNA sequential analysis:

The 16SrDNA gene order is seen shown in the nucleotides sequence tabulation.The 16S rRNA gene order of DZ1 is carried out the BLAST compare of analysis with number Genbank according to the sequence in the storehouse, the result shows: DZ1 and Bacillus subtilis are in the branch of a minimum together, and the similarity of the 16SrRNA gene order of the nearest DZ1 of evolutionary distance and Bacillus subtilis (AJ276351) reaches 98%.Comprehensive physiological and biochemical property and colony morphology characteristic, it is accredited as bacillus sp., be preserved in China Committee for Culture Collection of Microorganisms's common micro-organisms center preservation on October 11st, 2011, its deposit number is CGMCC No.5318.

Embodiment 2 pot experiments

The living subtilis DZ1 of winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting that preserves is activated on the LB inclined-plane, and picking one articulating enters in the beef-protein medium, and in 37 â, shaking culture is 2 days under the 180rpm condition, and transferring bacterial concentration is 2.5 * 10 8Cfu/ml (suspension A), for subsequent use.Field planting winter jujube seedling is stained with root in suspension A after.The suspension A for preparing is transferred bacterial concentration to 1 * 10 8Cfu/ml (suspension B) gets 50ml suspension B and evenly waters inoculate annual winter jujube seedling around winter jujube shoot root section.Winter jujube seedling is stained with root in sterilized water after, the sterilized water of pouring equivalent is contrast.Normal management, the fresh weight of mensuration root system, capillary root weight, height of seedling and leading thread after winter jujube seedling stops growing then.Result such as table 1 and shown in Figure 1.

As can be seen from the table, DZ1 process that total root of winter jujube is heavy, radicula is heavy, height of seedling and the end directly respectively contrast improved 25.70%, 86.64%, 6.99% and 15.16%.More than show: bacterial strain DZ1 is to the growth of winter jujube, and especially (ï¼2mm) growth has obvious promoter action to radicula.

Embodiment 3 field tests

The living subtilis DZ1 of winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting is in the reciprocation type vibrator, and in 37 â, shaking culture is 2 days under the 180rpm condition, and transferring bacterial concentration is 5.0 * 10 8Cfu/ml is inoculated in the Chicken dung, makes Winter jujube biological fertilizer (0.5 * 10 8Cfu/g).Take the Chicken dung of equivalent as contrast, every tree is used 8.5kg.Fertilization mode adopts all directions four lateral sulcus to execute, and ditch length and width and height are respectively 60,30 and 20cm, with behind Winter jujube biological fertilizer and the abundant mixing of soil that digs out again backfill enter.30 trees of every processing arrange guard rows.After using 2 years, adopt formol titration to measure total amino acid content in the winter jujube rhizosphere soil, adopt anthrone colorimetric method for determining total sugar content, adopt Agilent HP-1100 series hplc determination organic acid content, the results are shown in Table 2.

As can be seen from the table, use the increase that bio-fertilizer that the living subtilis DZ1 of winter jujube rhizosphere growth-promoting makes can promote the root exudates in the winter jujube rhizosphere soil.Compare with contrast (CK), total amino acid content, organic acid total amount and total sugar content that bio-fertilizer is processed (DZ1) have improved and have reached respectively 55.56%, 27.48% and 37.18%, and winter jujube root system significantly strengthens the ability that absorbs of soil nutrient.
